d: For Sherlock Holmes cosplay, or just a really nice coat.

s.cutBackStay.t: The back stay is not shown
s.cutBackStay.d: The **Back stay** (2a) is not shown, but you can trace it from the Back part (2). Trace the outline above the canvas line that curves from the top of the back fold to under the armhole.
s.cutChestPocketBag.t: The chest pocket bag is not shown
s.cutChestPocketBag.d: The **Chest pocket bag** (17) is a rectangular piece of fabric {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long.
s.cutChestPocketWelt.t: The chest pocket welt is not shown
s.cutChestPocketWelt.d: The **Chest pocket welt** (12) is a rectangular piece of fabric {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long.
s.cutFrontFacing.t: The front facing is not shown
s.cutFrontFacing.d: The **Front facing** (1a) is not shown, but you can trace it from the Front part (1). Trace the outline left from the facing/lining boundary.
s.cutFrontLining.t: The front lining is not shown
s.cutFrontLining.d: The **Front lining** (1b) is not shown, but you can trace it from the Front part (1). Trace the outline right from the facing/lining boundary.
s.cutInnerPocketBag.t: The inner pocket bag is not shown
s.cutInnerPocketBag.d: The **Inner pocket bag** (14) is a rectangle {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long.
s.cutInnerPocketWelt.t: The inner pocket welt is not shown
s.cutInnerPocketWelt.d: The **Inner pocket welt** (13) is a rectangle {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long.
s.cutTail.d: The **Tail** (5) is a rectangular piece of fabric {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long.

seatEase.d: Amount of ease around your bum

pocketFlapRadius.d: The amount by which the pocket flap is rounded

pocketRadius.d: The amount by which the pocket is rounded

buttonSpacingHorizontal.d: Horizontal spacing of the buttons, also determines the front closure overlap

lapelReduction.d: Controls how much the lapel tip goes inwards.

frontOverlap.d: Controls how much the right and left front of the garment overlap at the center front.

pocketHeight.d: Controls the height of the front pockets

pocketWidth.d: Controls the width of the front pockets

chestPocketPlacement.d: Controls the location of the chest pocket.

chestPocketAngle.d: Controls the slant of the chest pocket.

chestPocketWidth.d: Controls the width of the chest pocket.

innerPocketPlacement.d: Controls the location of the inner pocket.

innerPocketDepth.d: Controls the depth of the inner pocket.

innerPocketWidth.d: Controls the width of the inner pocket.

innerPocketWeltHeight.d: Controls the height of the inner pocket welts.

sleeveBend.d: The angle of the sleeve at the elbow.

sleevecapHeight.d: Controls the height of the sleevecap.

sleevecapEase.d: Controls the amount of sleevecap ease.

cuffLength.d: Controls the length (height if you wish) of the cuffs.

collarFlare.d: Controls the flare of the collar by altering the fall length (between the neck and the tips) of the collar.

collarSpread.d: Controls how close the collar lies to the neck.

waistEase.d: Controls the amount of ease at your waist.
